website_summaries.verdict: Quaint-looking, black holder designed to sit against back wall of counter, with wire basket on top for extra storage.
pros: Wrought-iron construct of this holder gives it long life under any kitchen conditions
Can be tucked away against back of countertop due to flat-back design
Holds up to 8 cups/mugs, and also has top wire basket for extra storage
Manufacturer has a reputation for quality products
cons: Placement of mugs and height of counter-top space should be considered (seems that extra-large ones cause space issues)

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy coffee mug holder!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is so cute...Very durable and does NOT fall or lean and does NOT need even weight distribution to stay upright! My mugs are 20-22 oz and very large and very heavy and no problems at all! I took a picture to show it with just one mug to show it doesn't tip over at all!
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really like this basket. It's sturdy, holds my 8 coffee cups and I place my k cups up top. Worth the 25 bucks! Looks great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Public Name (required)

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: There's only one small flaw. I have a mix of 10 to 15 ounce mugs, so when you're putting them on, it might tip forward... and you might break a few mugs. Womp womp. Lol Other than that, it's just gorgeous and very practical! I have a k-cup holder so I use the basket on top for a fruit basket. It's amazing! It is pretty large but what do you expect for something that holds 8 mugs. I love this thing for my office!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute but Topples Over
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea of this product. It is convenient to have a basket for the k-cups right where the mugs are stored. It makes sense! However, the product easily gets top-heavy, falls over and crashes on the counter. I lost a (sentimental, unfortunately) mug this way. The product fell over multiple times. If you can, affix it to your wall for stability and security. We have a stone-like tile on the wall above our kitchen counters, do that was not a solution for us.
customer_reviews.author: Nox

customer_reviews.title: Great product not so great after all...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for k-cups on top and to hang all the coffee cups as well. Adding on to my previous statement this ended up not being as stable as I thought at the Beginning, as I started to put my new heavier mugs on, the whole rack tips over constantly. ☹ really liked it at 1st. Not so much now, getting rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: so cute
customer_reviews.text: This rack looks so cute on the counter next to my coffee maker. I was worried it would topple over once mugs were added but it is standing strong. I did have to cut out some cardboard to add to the bottom of the top basket though to keep packets from falling through. It will hold average sized mugs snugly but it does seem to be better made for slightly smaller mugs like the kind you get with new plates/bowls sets. Those big starbucks "city" mugs are too big.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: This item is nicely made, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Made a coffee bar in my kitchen and this is just what the coffee bar needed. This item is nicely made, sturdy, and attractive looking. Does not look flimsy. Added some farmhouse signs that I made to my coffee bar and it is the look I was going for. Looks elegant with my Yankee mugs hanging from it. Can store a fair amount of coffee pods in the basket up above. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with 1 of 3 feet missing. Very sturdy without the others which I removed.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with one of three spot welded balls for feet missing. Noticed while still sealed in plastic wrap. To big a hassle to return. I just knocked off the other two. It is sturdy enough and probably should not even have the feet. It would be better if the tree was another 4 inches higher as the mugs keep you from having good access to the basket. Other than that it works. Really bad quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in OK

customer_reviews.title: Good cup holder, made sturdy with a good base.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice cup holder. Sturdy and attractive, very solid base . My problem is I use large mugs and it is hard to hang them all on the rack. Smaller cups would work fine. I gave it away to a friend. Still looking to find one that will hold 6 larger mugs.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Plan on a new paint job if you buy this
customer_reviews.text: It would have been a perfectly nice mug rack if it weren't for the terrible slapped on faux copper weathering. They took a nice product and made it look like garbage. It looked like someone sneezed on it in copper paint. We kept it anyway because it still serves the purpose we bought it for but honestly, plan on giving it a coat of paint when it arrives to cover up the awful finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mug tree. I have never had a mug tree so I have nothing to compare it to. It is very sturdy. I was unsure (when ordering) of whether it would be stable enough but it definitely is! The top basket holds a very large amount of K cups however, due to the height of the product, they are not easy to get out. Being flat on the back, I have it on the back of the countertop pushed up against the backsplash. So the upper cabinet does not leave much room to get anything out. This was my fault for not taking that into consideration. I do reccomend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya G

customer_reviews.title: VERY tippy, poor design.
customer_reviews.text: This is the dumbest design for a coffee mug stand. The 3 leg design makes it VERY tippy and if you put heavy mugs on it it will tip very easily and break all your mugs. Trust me. I learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: It’s a space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Sits perfectly in the corner on top of my counter. Using this frees up cabinet space especially if you are limited- plus mugs can take up a nice amount of cabinet space.. It’s my tea station. I keep it filled with my mugs and use the top storage area to keep my lemons and a few tea bags..
customer_reviews.author: MinaLolita

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This mug tree is larger than I thought it would be - it should have been obvious since it needs to hold 8 mugs, but I've never owned one. It's pretty lightweight, but seems sturdy. Holds 8 mugs (11 oz. size) well without tipping. I also love the basket on top for the Kcup pods.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Joy

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: This was sturdy and holds a lot, I liked the basket on top, however my only complaint is my coffee cups clanked together, the knobs were too close together & it chipped a few. Not super impressed with the overall practicality of it. Also it is huge and takes up a lot of room. My keurig is smaller than it.
customer_reviews.author: B Jacs

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional mug tree!
customer_reviews.text: love this mug tree! it looks great in my kitchen and was exactly what I was expecting. However, it has six hooks but only fits four mugs, unless you have tiny mugs to go on the bottom or you don’t fill the bottom with K cups. Stores about 15 K cups.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Japaridze

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tree mug and basket. Excellent for space saving and convenience. Pros: Strong and sturdy. Convenient next to coffee maker. Basket holds a lot of capsules for coffee. Hangs 8 large coffee mugs at a time. Cons: Basket has wider width between coated bars. Sometimes capsule slips thru but not a big deal. Highly recommend for coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose accessory
customer_reviews.text: This mug rack is great. It holds my K-cups, 8 mugs and sits flat against the wall! Much better than the round one it replaced. Clears up space on my counter. In the space under the basket at the top I keep my jar of decaf.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasant Pansy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: We love this cup holder but we didn’t even think about how we took the mugs off and it became unbalanced and fell over. Luckily the remaining cups didn’t break. Definitely, our fault. Otherwise, great item.
customer_reviews.author: A. Matt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend if you have the room
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved it, but I’m in a rental with extremely low cabinets and it didn’t really fit well. It’s very sturdy and somehow it he mugs don’t pull it over! Great item
customer_reviews.author: Crissy E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mug tree and k-cup holder
customer_reviews.text: One of the few holders that will hold 8 cups, fit under the cabinet, and up against the wall. Because it holds 8 cups, it is better suited to hold smaller 8-10 oz cups, instead of 12+ oz cups. We have both, and it will hold them both, I just think that its designed for the smaller ones. It looks beautiful on my counter. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bon G

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Finished!
customer_reviews.text: I’m totally disappointed! It’s supposed to be black. Instead it is a copper color with random paintbrush strokes of black! Obviously no quality control exists!!
customer_reviews.author: Louise P.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I love the basket below for sweetener. I ONLY wish it was a LITTLE taller to hold bigger mugs. They fit, but its tight. Overall, I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Coppolino

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! It was perfect for my coffee bar. Strong, sturdy looks great and all 6 coffee mugs fit perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand so I could store K-cups and mugs on my counter in something that looked neat. Does the job and looks great! Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Peg H

customer_reviews.title: and I like it. I gave 4 stars because my 1st ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister and got one for myself. My sister loves it, and I like it. I gave 4 stars because my 1st one came in broken. One of the mug holders was laying in the bottom of the bag, so I have some concern about the quality of the weld or solder. We shall see...the company was quick to replace the item and it was hassle free!
customer_reviews.author: Michael McDuffie

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy and super cute. Can't go wrong with Mikasa, good quality. Only thing wrong with it is the basket, I put sugar packets and tea bags in it but they gal out. I made a little plate to fit the bottom so nothing falls out. Maybe if the wires were closer together?....
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I both needed and wanted. Put my kpod and sweetener in basket. In addition, it looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger F

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa flat back mug tree
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for what I need it for. I did not give it 5 stars because it does not fit all of my Rae Dunn mugs like I’d hope. But it’s fine. It still looks nice and displays them well. The basket at the top is large enough for a couple boxes of k-cups, which is handy. I took pictures with my mugs so others can see how it fits the Rae Dunn collection, since I could not find any pictures when I was looking.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan K.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great for if you have a kurig because you can store the k-cups on top. Kind of feels like it is going to fall over when there is coffee mugs on it. Also when you put normal coffee mugs on it they clash together and just don’t look very good. Does look very nice in my kitchen next to my kurig though. Overall one of my favorite products.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Laun

customer_reviews.title: Too small for normal mugs
customer_reviews.text: The basket part is cool but the hangers are too close to each other which makes hanging our cool coffee mugs clank into one another. We're returning ours.
customer_reviews.author: G.E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great mug stand. Its flat on the back to save space on the counter. Its very sturdy, I have several large mugs on it and it wont tip over. I put sugar packets and k cups in the basket on the top. It so cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly White

customer_reviews.title: Easy access
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. This way I have room for coffee and coffee cups
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Hansel

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my space.
customer_reviews.text: It wont hold large mugs but it is pretty and fuctional. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: leslie daniel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Cute design and fits well. Also holds 8 cups and not 6 which is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: just as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is just one piece and very sturdy. I have 8 mugs, 14 & 16 oz, that are on there. I was able to empty 3 small boxes of K-cups on the top. Even when there are only a couple of mugs on there, it still stays in place and does not wobble. I am very happy with it and it is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Massaro

customer_reviews.title: Kinda unstable
customer_reviews.text: If the weight is off on one side of this thing by just a little, it will tip over. It lookes really cute and it does work, but you have to be very careful with how you place your cups and how you take them off to avoid everything falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Maximizes counter space by going up to wall flat Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Revitz

customer_reviews.title: Great rack
customer_reviews.text: I have different size mugs, looks a bit clustered filled up, but very nice. It was more expensive in the store.
customer_reviews.author: HikerGirl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I thought it was - very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Just take a look at it! Isn't it adorable?? All my mugs fit perfectly in this mug tree and it sits out on my counter conveniently for that last cup of chamomile tea at night. I have extra storage in the top for other things. I just love this. Good quality and a nice black finish. Goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Behr

customer_reviews.title: Coffee cups fall off
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this, but several of the cup holders are not angled and my coffee cups slide off. I've broken three coffee cups so far so will be looking for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Anad

customer_reviews.title: Everything was as expected: the color and size. ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected: the color and size. However the top two posts appeared that they would not hold mugs. I read other reviews and saw that I could bend them into position so that it now holds 6 mugs. Very attractive on my counter next to my Keurig. It is just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: marsha hayes

customer_reviews.title: So pretty and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I'm afraid it might tip over if I have it full of cups but its beautiful and works great. So far it hasn't tipped over, thinking about nailing it to the wall so it wont happen.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I ordered it to go on my coffee bar. It holds the mugs and it sturdy and decorative. It also hold a lot of the k-cups. I highly recommend it! It's a nice addition to my coffee/tea/hot drink bar.
customer_reviews.author: IslandTime

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GREAT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Love it, fits in the corner of my coffee bar and holds just enough keurig pods and then our coffee mugs nice weight and fast delivery......very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: Ample size basket that doesn't overwhelm limited counter space. Able to store a significant number of espresso capsules and 6 of my favorite cups
customer_reviews.author: Neicey

customer_reviews.title: Balance
customer_reviews.text: Watch how you balance your cups. If you pull the wrong one off it will tip sideways
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design. Requires cups to be evenly spaced at ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible design. Requires cups to be evenly spaced at all times or it topples over, dumping the mugs. Luckily I caught mine before they fell to the floor and shattered.
customer_reviews.author: KSS1945

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and works great for organizing kcups and mugs next to my keriug
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wendlandt

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I was prepared for something flimsy and low quality but I am pleasantly amazed! High quality, sturdy construction that I expect will easily last a very long time. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: dawn hagar

customer_reviews.text: One of the hooks is pulled down. I can’t get it to bend back and I threw away the box.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this over a year now and it works great. Love that it fits flat against the wall. I use it everyday. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Tamara kardoskee

customer_reviews.title: Functional but awkward
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this product, but it is a bit tall to fit well under my cabinets by my keurig. I have to pull it away from the backsplash which is awkward because it looks designed to hug the wall or some surface.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hancox

customer_reviews.title: Awkward mug holder
customer_reviews.text: You can’t use the basket underneath once there are mugs on it. Also once you remove mugs it tips over.
customer_reviews.author: RandiOlsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Would give it five stars but does hold larger cups only normal one cup cups
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Faber

customer_reviews.title: For me
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I've got more counter room now & I can put some of my teas out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Reichard

customer_reviews.title: Topples over
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy enough to hold 8 cups without topping over. Looks nice but not of good stature.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the top of our "coffee bar", Holds my husband's old cafe cup collection and his favorite flavors of K-cups. No, it won't hold giant mugs, but it's great for displaying regular sized coffee cups. Very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Net Tech

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed
customer_reviews.text: I hang my dpecial coffee cups and i store bananad on the top!
customer_reviews.author: Dancer

customer_reviews.title: This looks so nice on my counter
customer_reviews.text: This looks so nice on my counter. I have mostly 20 oz mugs and they fit fine. Well made and love the basket at top for my K-cups.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D.

customer_reviews.title: ... when I moved in March and it's been so great! I use the top to hold fruit and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I moved in March and it's been so great! I use the top to hold fruit and the hooks for both mugs and (weirdly) baskets that we have pens/markers in! It came in a timely fashion as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Brierton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I love how it sits on the counter (although I do plan to hang it) and is balanced perfectly to hang mugs on without the concern of it tipping over. Love the basket on top- one package of Keurig cups fills it halfway. Very cute, and arrived in two days!
customer_reviews.author: M. Starks

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for small cups
customer_reviews.text: Love this to display my small coffee cups that came with my dish place settings. Unfortunately, it is not made for oversized mugs. I like that the basket on top holds all my random coffee stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jldean77

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Would give it Five stars but too many cups and it is not to stable
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: This basket is beautiful. It is perfect and the picture doesn't do ...
customer_reviews.text: This basket is beautiful. It is perfect and the picture doesn't do it justice. I needed a mug rack that was just a little nicer than usual and this is it
customer_reviews.author: chicamom85

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I needed more space in my cabinets and wanted a convenient place to store fruit. It was the perfect solution and has not fallen over despite the various apples and oranges I placed in the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V

customer_reviews.title: I love this little basket
customer_reviews.text: I love this little basket. Most of the time I keep about 6 mugs on it and I've never had any issue with it falling over. However it is hard to put oversized mugs on it, I suggest not buying this for huge mugs, only traditionally sized ones.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and made well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I had originally ordered a different mug rack that was cheap and tipped over when there was only one mug on it. This one however, is extreemely user friendly and sturdy. It os made well and works great, whether there is one mug on it or four.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Holds my heavy mugs and is a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Holds my heavy mugs and is a real counter space saver - I am a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: ynning

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly practical
customer_reviews.text: I love this all my k cups and mugs together perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kathy N.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you realize how big this is before you ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you realize how big this is before you buy. Also, mine was broken, the wrought iron was not connected on one side. I'm too lazy to send it back though and it still works correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy and wide to separate your mugs. I love the storage on top. Great use of space.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R. Leighton

customer_reviews.title: It was larger than I thought it was going to be but was just fine with my granddaughter for whom the purchase was made
customer_reviews.text: This mug tree seems to be very well made. It was larger than I thought it was going to be but was just fine with my granddaughter for whom the purchase was made.
customer_reviews.author: P L. Kome

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Two of the hooks were broken on arrival. We decided to keep and use though because it actually allowed us to fit some bigger mugs. My wife is happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JeremyWF

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and feels sturdy. So happy to have stylish mug storage to free up cabinet space.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item....the footprint is not overwhelming and with limited cupboard space this fits the bill. Nice design and study.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love this mug tree and coffee holder, looks great on my cabinet, holds 8 mugs and more coffee than expected!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: It’s really pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: This looks great on my counter! Keeps my k pods and coffee cups right where I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cook

customer_reviews.title: A little big( requires a big space ) in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it's too big for my little space in my kitchen. But I'm saving it and maybe I can give it as a gift for my friend who have a big space in her kitchen .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! The basket holds about 18 K-Cups and four ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! The basket holds about 18 K-Cups and four of my smaller mugs. It looks adorable on my kitchen counter!
customer_reviews.author: Love Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: We used this to help organize our coffee corner in the church kitchen. Works well in our space, just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M

customer_reviews.title: Its stylish and extremely accomodating
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this mug tree. And the basket on top. I am using this right now at its full potential. I have all eight mugs on it and the basket is full right next to my keurig😀 I'm a happy consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L Parada

customer_reviews.title: 💪🏼
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a while now, nice addition to my kitchen. Great for my coffee station, keeps my mugs and kcups all together.
customer_reviews.author: Arelys Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cannot accommodate mugs without them hitting each other and making it difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G Boveda

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it holds eight mugs and that it has a basket on the top for extra tea that I cant fit in my tea box.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Covo

customer_reviews.title: Some of the arms were not straight... ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the arms were not straight..... had to bend into place. Not a big deal, however when you buy something "new" it shouldn't need to be adjusted, and you don't want to weaken the metal.
customer_reviews.author: felicia myers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful plus well made
customer_reviews.text: This is just beautiful. It is well made and sturdy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my coffee station very convenient for cups and Kcups....all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Summersun

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore my coffee mug holder. It is sturdy and holds my mugs very well. I have received so many compliments from visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Shaidikia Evans

customer_reviews.title: but it was not a good fit for my larger
customer_reviews.text: The mug tree is well made, but it was not a good fit for my larger, over-sized mugs. They did not fit on the hooks. Small coffee cups would probably fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good amount of kcups and I have Starbucks “You are here” mugs hanging on the hooks and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Woods

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Basket on top is perfect for storing K cups! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: E. Havelka

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.text: A little off balance when cups are hung. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like it. It is attractive and the cup spacing is perfect for large mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about it falling over but it is very sturdy. I was also worried that my mugs wouldn't fit since most of them are large and different shapes, but they all fit nicely. I love this!! I can fit all my K-Cups on top.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Schrute

customer_reviews.title: Its attractive & functional
customer_reviews.text: This fits my k-cups in the top and my coffee mugs and latte mugs on the bottomm!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Janda

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL. We set this up today and took 1 mug off and the entire stand fell over and broke half our mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Suits

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t take up a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: This is Great.You can hang 8 mugs and coffee on top in basket.I love it
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I used it to display Rae Dunn Icon mugs in my guest bedroom.

customer_reviews.title: NIce quality

product_meta.title: Gourmet Basics by Mikasa French Countryside Metal Mug Tree with Storage Basket, Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:French Countryside, Glossy BlackThis Gourmet Basics by Mikasa French Countryside Mug Tree with basket is handcrafted from wrought iron with an glossy black finish for long-lasting beauty even under rigorous use. It features 8 hooks to hang mugs and a wire basket on top for extra storage. The flatback design allows for mug tree to be placed up against the back wall of your countertop. Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Mugs not included. Measures 14-3/4 inches high.
feature_bullets: Handcrafted from wrought iron for long-lasting beauty even under rigorous use
Features 8 hooks to hang mugs and a wire basket on top for extra storage
The flatback design allows for mug tree to be placed up against the back wall of your countertop
Measures 14-3/4 inches high; mugs not included
Wipe clean with a soft, damp cloth
